text: Scarlet Pages is a 1930 crime drama film directed by Ray Enright and based on the play of the same name. It stars Elsie Ferguson, Marian Nixon, John Halliday, Grant Withers, William B. Davidson and distributed by Warner Bros.. ==Other websites== * * Category:1930 drama movies Category:1930 crime movies Category:1930s American crime drama movies Category:Movies based on plays Category:Movies directed by Ray Enright Category:Warner Bros. movies
title: Scarlet Pages
